Responsible for configuration in Retail, TPM and Solution Manager while involved in Presales, Roadmap Workshops, New customer project's, Upgrades and Escalations.      For a $300 billion customer's global FI implementation, developed and educated the PMO and project team on leveraging Solution Manager's rich functionality, defined project's, scoped and build-out business process. SegregatedExperience.JobDescription:
Provided consulting guidance and leadership for over 45 companies with over 15 companies on the 
 Fortune 500 list, two in the top ten of all US corporation's. Responsible for configuration in Retail, TPM and Solution Manager while involved in Presales, Roadmap Workshops, New customer project's, Upgrades and Escalations. 
 
 For a $300 billion customer's global FI implementation, developed and educated the PMO and project team on leveraging Solution Manager's rich functionality, defined project's, scoped and build-out business process. Provided daily direction to project team. Established standards and procedures for ongoing operational use built a global project and the controls necessary to a take one county live, build out two subsequent county project's while allowing the original project to support continued enhancements. Using this overall functionality allowed multiple project's to be linked and produced huge cost savings in both time and dollars. Contributed to future savings due to centralized use of common project'scope, documentation and configuration. Consistently pre-delivered Solution Manager'support via project's global template functionality without interruption to the Project Team's time line. 
 
 to keep global project on schedule, uncovered a HP Quality Center functionality code defect that would put the project at risk with time line delays negotiated Partner's acknowledgement and correction code which eliminated project risk for all customer's going forward, while protecting our project work and time line. 
 
 For a $10 billion international company, client needed to fully document existing live business processes. Employed consulting skills and tool use along with custom methodology to develop baseline business processes achieved first customer use of Solution Manager's Document Assistant Enterprise functionality in the US; trained client'staff and fellow consultants 
 
 to secure a future software sale for a $13 billion consumer product's company and significantly expanded the TPM future functionality so it met the changing industry requirements, our project was chosen as the worldwide driver for the future developed content new content delivered in the CRM 2007 and CRM7.0 releases; adding Agreements, Trade Funds and Trader Claims and Indirect promotion functionality. 
 
 Configured and delivered a TPM proof of concept demo for a $19 billion company to help them determine if they should adopt standard SAP TPM solution or stay with their current SAP custom solution to manage their massive yearly promotional spending recommended client'stay with their custom solution which was working well, had no risk and there was no reason to change. 
 
 Served on early TPM project for a $10 billion dollar CPG company to provide configuration and custom code regression testing the ongoing changes while a highly customized solution was being created by being able to spot system changes quickly we were able to streamline the project from the realization phase through a successful Go Live surfacing and addressing issues in real time; went live successfully and was brought back to support a later upgrade project. 
 
 For SAP internal German Solution Validation Testing Result : tested and uncovered bugs requiring Developer resolution and to make TPM 4.0 was ready for customer release. 
 
 to upgrade a $5 billion Retail customer from R3 to 4.6c, took an early customer with a high level of custom code and successfully upgraded them achieved on-time and on-budget while taking advantage of new standard functionality; reduced unnecessary custom code.

ResumeParserData.Summary: Insightful, analytical and responsive SAP IT Professional with a proven history of success. Creative & persistent problem solver, who thrives on challenges, is calm under pressure and gets the job done. Dedicated, project-oriented and enthusiastic team builder who possesses outstanding interpersonal and excellent communication skills. Strong, hands-on leader and catalyst, organized and thorough planner, and win / win negotiator dealing effectively across all levels of the organization. Accustomed to a fast pace and balances competitive agendas while consistently providing value-added advice to management enabling them to meet their strategic objectives.
ResumeParserData.ExecutiveSummary: R. has been currently working for Accenture LLP
ResumeParserData.ManagementSummary: Currently, R. holds a Mid Management Level position, as Solution Manager Practice at Orasi Software, Inc. from 09/01/2010 to 09/30/2010
ResumeParserData.DetailResume:
R.THOMAS WHITE
Westfield, NJ 07090
908-232-4655  
   r.thomas.white@comcast.net

SUMMARY OF QUALIFICATIONS
Insightful, analytical and responsive SAP IT Professional with a proven history of success. Creative & persistent problem solver, who thrives on challenges, is calm under pressure and gets the job done. Dedicated, project-oriented and enthusiastic team builder who possesses outstanding interpersonal and excellent communication skills. Strong, hands-on leader and catalyst, organized and thorough planner, and win/win negotiator dealing effectively across all levels of the organization. Accustomed to a fast pace and balances competitive agendas while consistently providing value-added advice to management enabling them to meet their strategic objectives.

Areas of Expertise

Project Management Consulting including as a Project Manager on SAP projects for Global CPG clients, led a Retail MIS project for our division while serving on the Corporate leadership team. Supported multiple client Escalation projects to get them back on track by providing PMO Process- discipline, Governance, and techncial support. Enabled project transparency with Stakeholder-Leadership by providing Testing, Issue - Risks and Change Process Management status reporting.
SAP Solution Manager Consulting including engaging and securing the client's Senior Management sponsorship of using Solution Manager to manage the corporation's IT landscape from an initial project through the Solution's post go live operational support, regression testing. Defining Solution Manager Standards & Procedures governance model with SDLC principals, integration of applying Best Practices lessons, defining project scope and identifying base business process procedures with stakeholders, training and supporting the functional & technical teams, providing change control management, issue resolution, executive level reporting & project quality control. 
General Management & Retail Operations including strategic planning, budgeting/forecasting, full P&L, product development, sourcing and purchasing, merchandise planning distribution & replenishment, staff	  training & development; production planning & scheduling, merchandising, inventory control, planning advertising campaigns, and total ownership of the product's supply chain through the customer sale.
SAP CRM-TPM-Trade Promotion Management Consulting including creation of transparent customer processes for account and promotional planning, promotional selling in & execution and analysis; gathering business requirements & mapping to standard functionality, integration with Trade Funds Management and Trade Claims Management, responding to RFQ creation of custom demo scripts, system configuration & demo delivery for Sales cycles, business process reengineering recommendations, building out custom to be business processes; defining required reports, interfaces, conversions, enhancement and forms, functional specification, configuring the system for prototyping, demo and production, configuration documentation and knowledge transfer;  supporting customer and integration testing , developing and mentoring consultants and end users. 

BUSINESS EXPERIENCE

10/11		  Accenture LLP, Florham Park, NJ	  management consulting, technology services and outsourcing.
 to Manager,
5/15	  
Project Manager SAP Projects, Global PMO Control Manager, Test Leadership.
 Led US based SAP TCM team on an international cross country TCM,TFM, TPM prototype project. Result : delivered on time and within budget SAP CRM 7.0 ECC 6.0 Trade Claims Management operational functionality. Educated Global CPG Client with knowledge transfer.

 Drove global deployment of IBM Rational Requirements Composure for issues  & risk usage. Result : led successful training and user adoption for over 1000 FTE in 3 geographies across 90+ projects. Achieved reporting transparency for ACN and client Program leadership. Managed off shore support team.

 Led multiple customer HPQC testing projects. Result : Directed test team with training,  test prep and execution planning, test metrics and daily defect meeting. Met all project milestones for two separate client projects. 

10/10		  Et- Alia LLC, Milwaukee, WI,  SAP Construction Solution Business Partner
 to Senior Solution Engineer,
6/11	  
Supporting multiple customer engagements while developing the internal Solution Manager Practice focused on creating our transportable Value Add Reseller Construction Industry template.

 Quickly established an Integration Testing strategy and operational use of the Test Management for a customer well into the Realization project phase. Supported with test scripts, test notes, test plan & packages and test reporting. Result : defined clear strategy and leadership of Integration Testing by fully leveraging SAP Test Management without delaying the start of testing. 

6/10		  Orasi Software, Inc, Kennesaw, GA,  HP Service Provider focused on HP Test Management Services	  
 to Senior Consultant, Solution Manager Practice,
09/10	  
 Integrated SAP Solution Manager and HP (Mercury) Testing tool into an operating Demo system. Result : built a fully functioning Solman HPQC Demo system for this key HP Support Partner

1998		  SAP America, Newtown Square, PA, the world leading provider of ERP software	  
 to Application Consultant/Senior Application Consultant, Solution Manager from 2006 to 2009 , 
11/09	  Trade Promotion Management from 2003 to 2009 , IS Retail from 1998 to 2003. 

Provided consulting guidance and leadership for over 45 companies with over 15 companies on the 
Fortune 500 list, two in the top ten of all US corporations. Responsible for configuration in Retail, TPM and Solution Manager while involved in Presales, Roadmap Workshops, New customer projects, Upgrades and Escalations. 

 For a $300 billion customer's global FI implementation, developed and educated the PMO and project team on leveraging Solution Manager's rich functionality, defined projects, scoped and build-out business process. Provided daily direction to project team. Established standards and procedures for ongoing operational use. Result : built a global project and the controls necessary to a take one county live, build out two subsequent county projects while allowing the original project to support continued enhancements. Using this overall functionality allowed multiple projects to be linked and produced huge cost savings in both time and dollars. Contributed to future savings due to centralized use of common project scope, documentation and configuration. Consistently pre-delivered Solution Manager support via project's global template functionality without interruption to the Project Team's time line.

 To keep global project on schedule, uncovered a HP Quality Center functionality code defect that would put the project at risk with time line delays. Result : negotiated Partner's acknowledgement and correction code which eliminated project risk for all customers going forward, while protecting our project work and time line.

 For a $10+ billion international company, client needed to fully document existing live business processes. Employed consulting skills and tool use along with custom methodology to develop baseline business processes. Result : achieved first customer use of Solution Manager's Document Assistant Enterprise functionality in the US; trained client staff and fellow consultants

 To secure a future software sale for a $13 billion consumer products company and significantly expanded the TPM future functionality so it met the changing industry requirements, our project was chosen as the worldwide driver for the future developed content. Result : new content delivered in the CRM2007 and CRM7.0 releases; adding Agreements, Trade Funds and Trader Claims and Indirect promotion functionality.

 Configured and delivered a TPM proof of concept demo for a $19 billion company to help them determine if they should adopt standard SAP TPM solution or stay with their current SAP custom solution to manage their massive yearly promotional spending. Result : recommended client stay with their custom solution which was working well, had no risk and there was no reason to change.

 Served on early TPM project for a $10+ billion dollar CPG company to provide configuration and custom code regression testing the ongoing changes while a highly customized solution was being created. Result : by being able to spot system changes quickly we were able to streamline the project from the realization phase through a successful Go Live surfacing and addressing issues in real time; went live successfully and was brought back to support a later upgrade project.

 For SAP internal German Solution Validation Testing Result : tested and uncovered bugs requiring Developer resolution and to make TPM 4.0 was ready for customer release. 

 To upgrade a $5 billion retail customer from R3 to 4.6c, took an early customer with a high level of custom code and successfully upgraded them. Result : achieved on-time and on-budget while taking advantage of new standard functionality; reduced unnecessary custom code. 

		  Retail Financial Analyst, CALVIN KLEIN JEANSWEAR, New York, NY.	  	  1996 to 1997 

		  BROOKS BROTHERS, New York, NY.	  			  1981 to 1995
 		  Technologist, Senior Merchandiser-
	Divisional Planning Manager, Project Manager, Buyer Product Developer, Store Manager,

EDUCATION
BA, Business, KANSAS WESLEYAN UNIVERSITY, 1971.

SAP CERTIFICATIONS : Customer Relationship Management (CRM) Certification, Solution Manager Certification.

SAP Release Configuration Experience : CRM : 4.0 , 5.0 , 5.2 , CRM 2007 , CRM 7.0 , ERP from 4.6C to ECC 6.0 , Solution Manager : 4.0 , 7.0 Enterprise Edition, HP Quality Center integration, U Perform integration, ARIS integration.

SAP INTERNAL TRAINING : IS Retail, CRM, Trade Promotion Management, Solution Manager boot camps.

R.THOMAS WHITE

Westfield, NJ 07090

908-232-4655 

 r.thomas.white@comcast.net

 

 

SUMMARY OF QUALIFICATIONS

Insightful, analytical and responsive SAP  IT  Professional with a proven history of success.  Creative & persistent problem solver, who thrives on challenges, is calm under pressure and gets the job done.  Dedicated, project-oriented and enthusiastic team builder who possesses outstanding interpersonal and excellent communication skills.  Strong, hands-on leader and catalyst, organized and thorough planner, and win/win negotiator dealing effectively across all levels of the organization.  Accustomed to a fast pace and balances competitive agendas while consistently providing value-added advice to management enabling them to meet their strategic objectives.

 

Areas of Expertise

 

Project Management  Consulting  including as a Project Manager on SAP projects for Global CPG clients, led a Retail MIS project for our division  while serving on the Corporate leadership team. Supported multiple client  Escalation projects to get them back on track by providing PMO Process- discipline, Governance,  and techncial support. Enabled project transparency with Stakeholder-Leadership by providing  Testing, Issue - Risks and  Change Process Management status reporting.

SAP Solution Manager Consulting including engaging and securing  the client's Senior Management sponsorship of using Solution Manager to manage the corporation's IT landscape from an initial project through the Solution's post go live operational support, regression  testing.  Defining Solution Manager Standards & Procedures governance model with SDLC principals, integration of applying Best Practices lessons, defining project scope and identifying base business process procedures with stakeholders, training and supporting the functional & technical teams, providing change control management, issue resolution, executive level reporting & project quality control.

General Management & Retail Operations including strategic planning, budgeting/forecasting, full P&L, product development, sourcing and purchasing, merchandise planning distribution & replenishment, staff training & development; production planning & scheduling, merchandising, inventory control, planning advertising campaigns, and total ownership of the product's supply chain through the customer sale.

SAP CRM-TPM-Trade Promotion Management Consulting including creation of transparent customer processes for account and promotional planning, promotional selling in & execution and analysis; gathering business requirements & mapping to standard functionality, integration with Trade Funds Management and  Trade Claims Management, responding to RFQ creation of custom demo scripts, system configuration & demo delivery for Sales cycles, business process reengineering recommendations, building out custom "to be business processes"; defining required reports, interfaces, conversions, enhancement and forms, functional specification, configuring the system for prototyping, demo and production, configuration documentation  and knowledge transfer;  supporting customer and integration testing , developing and mentoring consultants and end users.

 

BUSINESS EXPERIENCE

 

10/11  Accenture LLP, Florham Park, NJ management consulting, technology services and outsourcing.

  to  Manager,

5/15

Project Manager SAP Projects, Global PMO Control Manager, Test Leadership.

 

*Led US based SAP TCM  team on an international cross country TCM,TFM, TPM prototype project. Result: delivered on time and within budget SAP CRM 7.0 ECC 6.0 Trade Claims Management operational functionality. Educated  Global CPG Client with  knowledge transfer.

 

*Drove global deployment of IBM Rational Requirements Composure for issues  & risk usage. Result: led successful training and user adoption for over 1000 FTE in 3 geographies across 90+ projects. Achieved reporting transparency for ACN and client Program leadership. Managed off shore support team.

 

*Led multiple customer  HPQC testing projects. Result: Directed  test team with training,  test prep and execution planning, test metrics and daily defect meeting. Met all project milestones for two separate client projects.

 

 

 

10/10   Et- Alia LLC, Milwaukee, WI,  SAP Construction Solution  Business Partner

  to  Senior Solution Engineer,

6/11   

Supporting multiple customer engagements while developing the internal  Solution Manager Practice focused on creating our transportable Value Add Reseller Construction Industry template.

 

*Quickly established an Integration Testing strategy and operational use of the Test Management  for a customer well into the Realization project phase. Supported with test scripts, test notes, test plan & packages and test reporting. Result: defined  clear strategy and leadership of Integration Testing by fully leveraging  SAP Test Management  without delaying the start of  testing.

 

 

6/10  Orasi Software, Inc, Kennesaw, GA,  HP Service Provider focused on  HP Test Management Services 

  to  Senior  Consultant, Solution Manager Practice,

09/10

*Integrated SAP  Solution Manager and  HP (Mercury) Testing tool into an operating  Demo system.  Result: built a fully functioning Solman HPQC Demo system for this key HP Support Partner

 

 

1998  SAP America, Newtown Square, PA, the world leading provider of ERP software  

  to  Application Consultant / Senior Application Consultant, Solution Manager from 2006 to 2009,

11/09 Trade Promotion Management from 2003 to 2009, IS Retail from 1998 to 2003.

 

Provided consulting guidance and leadership for over 45 companies with over 15 companies on the

Fortune 500 list, two in the top ten of all US corporations. Responsible for configuration in Retail, TPM and Solution Manager while involved in Presales, Roadmap Workshops, New customer projects, Upgrades and Escalations.

 

*For a $300 billion customer's global FI implementation, developed and educated the PMO and project team on leveraging Solution Manager's rich functionality, defined projects, scoped and build-out business process.  Provided daily direction to project team.  Established standards and procedures for ongoing operational use.  Result: built a global project and the controls necessary to a take one county live, build out two subsequent county projects while allowing the original project to support continued enhancements. Using this overall functionality allowed multiple projects to be linked and produced huge cost savings  in both time and dollars.  Contributed to future savings due to centralized use of common project scope, documentation and configuration. Consistently pre-delivered Solution Manager support via project's global template functionality without interruption to the Project Team's time line.

 

*To keep global project on schedule, uncovered a HP Quality Center functionality code defect that would put the project at risk with time line delays. Result: negotiated Partner's acknowledgement and correction code which eliminated project risk for all customers going forward, while protecting our project work and time line.

 

*For a $10+ billion international company, client needed to fully document existing live business processes.  Employed consulting skills and tool use along with custom methodology to develop baseline business processes.  Result: achieved first customer use of Solution Manager's Document Assistant Enterprise functionality in the US; trained client staff and fellow consultants

 

*To secure a future software sale for a $13 billion consumer products company and significantly expanded the TPM future functionality so it met the changing industry requirements, our project was chosen as the worldwide driver for the future developed content. Result: new content delivered in the CRM2007 and CRM7.0 releases; adding Agreements, Trade Funds and Trader Claims and Indirect promotion functionality.

 

*Configured and delivered a TPM proof of concept demo for a $19 billion company to help them determine if they should adopt standard SAP TPM solution or stay with their current SAP custom solution to manage their massive yearly promotional spending. Result: recommended client stay with their custom solution which was working well, had no risk and there was no  reason to change.

 

*Served on early TPM project for a $10+ billion dollar CPG company to provide configuration and custom code regression  testing the ongoing changes while a highly customized solution was being created. Result: by being able to spot system changes quickly we were able to streamline the project from the realization phase through a successful Go Live surfacing and addressing issues in real time; went live successfully and was brought back to support a later upgrade project.

 

*For SAP  internal German  Solution Validation Testing  Result:  tested and uncovered bugs requiring  Developer resolution and to make TPM 4.0 was ready for customer release.

 

*To upgrade a $5 billion retail customer from R3 to 4.6c, took an early customer with a high level of custom code and successfully upgraded them. Result:  achieved on-time and on-budget while taking advantage of new standard functionality; reduced unnecessary custom code.

SAP CERTIFICATIONS: Customer Relationship Management (CRM) Certification, Solution Manager Certification.

 

SAP Release Configuration Experience: CRM: 4.0, 5.0, 5.2, CRM 2007, CRM 7.0, ERP from 4.6C to ECC 6.0, Solution Manager: 4.0, 7.0 Enterprise Edition, HP Quality Center integration, U Perform integration, ARIS integration.

 

 

SAP INTERNAL TRAINING: IS Retail, CRM, Trade Promotion Management, Solution Manager boot camps.
